front.title: Analysis of Security Association for Current Routing Protocols

abstract.t: This document analyzes the security associations used by current routing protocols, including RIPv2, OSPFv2, ISIS, BFD, BGP, OSPFv3, PCE, LDP, LMP, MSDP, RSVP-TE, PIM, and BGP. It also discusses the possible approach to the diversity issue of routing protocol security associations.
